name: The 6 Chambers of Die!ce
description:
Newt, the Dice Roller, must face the dangers of the 6 chambers of Die!ce to regain control of her fate. The die have been cast. Can Newt survive the unpredictable?

Plan your steps across 6 increasingly difficult turn-based dungeons, with a scarce arsenal, but powerful when used wisely.

Controls:
(WASD-Arrow keys) Move
(Mouse) Use dice

Made for the 7DRL 2022 in a week by:
Clare Pearce - Art (twitter)
Fernando García - Programming (twitter)
Le Slo - Game Design (twitter)
Pikewin - Audio (twitter)
